work.summary: Contributed in development of an open-source platform for serverless applications that allowed the developer community to explore, host and deploy serverless applications with ease. Developed a virtual assistant for the platform helping new users get an overview of serverless and deployment on Kubernetes clusters by using natural language processing (NLP). Developed a robust API for virtual assistant which can be integrated with any messaging platforms which allowed the platform to reach wider audiences.
highlights: Created a virtual assistant which is compatible with multiple messaging platforms and IDEs

work.summary: Mentored students in Programming with Data course with key concepts in programming, data structures and data analysis.Assisted professor with conducting review sessions, quizzes and grading
highlights: Conducted teaching sessions throughout the course
Created a virtual assistant which is compatible with multiple messaging platforms and IDEs

work.summary: Worked with Platform team to develop v2.0 of Playback API by actively contributing to their codebase.Analyzed enterprise scale data (about a billion requests) and derived insights from those analysis to measure and improve response times of the requests, content geo restrictions and time delays. Contributed in API design and implementation which enhanced the authentication service for video playback.
highlights: Create data model to track response times and provided insights to improve the duration
Improved authentication api design by implementing a load testing module

work.summary: Developed a Proof of Concept for sentiment analysis using NLTK by creating an end to end system having Kafka and Elasticsearch integration for large scale data and analyzed its results on Kibana. Implemented a key objective by developing a system to predict information of customer using the Facebook data and analyzed it for targeted advertising. The system used Graph API for data analysis.
highlights: Successfully implemented features to analyze client data and derived insights from them.
Contributed to a CSR event where I mentored underprivileged students for career in computer science

volunteer.summary: Mentored girls and women in programmming. Contributed to workshops on data visualization, python programming and introduction to coding.
Volunteered as a teaching assistant for school students. Mentored students in English and Math courses.

publications.name: Blockchain-based remittances using CUDA
publications.summary: Published and Presented a technical paper on implementation of Blockchain for remittances at the 2017 International Conference on Smart Technologies for Smart Nation.

publications.name: System and Methods for Task Management using real-time Location-based Notifications.
publications.summary: Patent published under the intellectual property of India services under the communication and technology category.
